text: <@U681ELA87> would it be reasonable to <<https://github.com/JuliaData/Arrow.jl/pull/89%7Cdefine> a default UUID <-> UInt128 type extension in Arrow.jl?> That PR seems to work well for my downstream use cases, I can add tests if you think it's sensible :slightly_smiling_face:
